title: Kylie Jenner posted her new R45m Bugatti Chiron but had to delete it after backlash
text:
Kylie Jenner posted her new R45m Bugatti Chiron but had to delete it after backlash share this

Reality star Kylie Jenner just bought herself a brand-new Bugatti Chiron but some of her followers were not impressed.

The 22-year- old posted a video of her new car on Instagram, but then deleted it shortly after because of the negative comments she received.

Followers of the star felt she shouldn’t have bought the car because “there are people out there who can't eat”, according to The Blast.

Other comments suggested that she should “use her money for good” and that the money she spent on the car “could a fed a village for at least a year.”

To put all this into perspective, Kylie’s new ride worth $3 million (R45 million).

Read more: Matching tattoos, Stormi and endless vacays: A timeline of Travis and Kylie's relationship

According to CNN the Bugatti is rated one of the fastest cars, the car can hit a maximum speed in excess of a whooping 483 km/h.

See her new car here:
description: Reality star Kylie Jenner just bought herself a brand-new Bugatti Chiron.
